name: Substance (Niborious)
description:
Substance

Made for Ludum Dare 40: The more you have , the worse it is.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/substance

Works best on Chrome.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40

Collect Coins while avoiding dangerous obstacles, and be sure to get out before you die!

The More coins you collect, the more dangerous it gets, and the more that it is at stake.
You only collect the coins you get if you make it back out.
You must decide whether to keep going or to save what you have.

There are various power ups that you can buy to help you out, but they may have some unwanted side effects.
The more you have, the worse it is.

WASD or Arrow keys
M to mute music.

Music taken from free domain.

Factory Time by Visager
http://freemusicarchive.org/tag/video_games/
